en.title: Hope Has No Borders
en.description: A grassroots response to the humanitarian crisis in Denver, bridging the gap from crisis to stability.
en.hero_body_text: A grassroots response to the humanitarian crisis in Denver, bridging the gap from crisis to stability through housing, legal aid, and dignity.
en.video_quote: "We are moms, neighbors, and community members bridging the gap from crisis to stability."

services.title: Housing Support
services.description: Transitional housing via our Host Home program, providing 90 days of stability.

services.title: Legal Navigation
services.description: Pro se asylum clinics, work permit applications, and legal document support.

services.title: Community Integration
services.description: Connecting immigrants and asylum-seekers to local service projects to build resume skills and community.

en.mission_quote: "To provide humanitarian aid and support to immigrants and asylum seekers, fostering a community where everyone has the opportunity to thrive."
en.cta_title: How can we help you today?
